info.name: DOA Market API
info.description: Complete API collection for DOA Market backend services deployed on AWS EKS - Updated 2026-01-19 with new user-app APIs

request.description: Alias route for getting user profile (same as GET /users/:userId)
Alias route for updating user profile (same as PATCH /users/:userId)
Get all orders for a specific user with pagination

query.description: Number of popular keywords to return (default: 10)

request.description: Get list of popular search keywords ranked by search count
Get search history for a specific user
Get all public notices - no authentication required (for user app)
